message: I served for 8 years. I'm an NRA member. The US Code explains the militia. 10 U.S. Code Â§ 311 - Militia: composition and classes. It would appear by law I am indeed a part of the militia. The Supreme Court of the United States affirmed the second amendment to be an individual right, unconnected with service in a militia. It would appear also that you are the one disregarding the true meaning of the second amendmemt as described by our highest court.
